column2: alert me in case of updates in my emails with subject QUOTED_STRING_0 having snippets equal to QUOTED_STRING_1 saying QUOTED_STRING_2
column3: monitor ( ( @com.gmail.inbox ) filter param:snippet:String == QUOTED_STRING_1 and param:subject:String =~ QUOTED_STRING_0 ) => @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.builtin.say param:message:String = QUOTED_STRING_2

column2: when a new xkcd is posted upload the pictures on tumblr
post the organizer on facebook when the time of some event changes on my icalendar .
column3: monitor ( @org.thingpedia.icalendar.list_events ) on new [ param:start_date:Date , param:end_date:Date ] => @com.facebook.post on param:status:String = param:organizer:String

column2: send me a message if the temperature on my thermostat change and their values becomes smaller than NUMBER_0 degrees
column3: edge ( monitor ( @thermostat.get_temperature ) ) on param:value:Measure(C) <= NUMBER_0 unit:F => notify

column2: send an sms message to PHONE_NUMBER_0 saying its descriptions of the new york times front page
column3: now => @com.nytimes.get_front_page => @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.phone.send_sms param:to:Entity(tt:phone_number) = PHONE_NUMBER_0 on param:message:String = param:description:String

column2: whenever my steps update on my fitbit tell me
share the category of the front page of reddit on linkedin
monitor the measurement on my scale and notify me if its time is before DURATION_0 after this week
column3: edge ( monitor ( @com.bodytrace.scale.get ) ) on param:time:Date <= start_of unit:week + DURATION_0 => notify

column2: show a popup containing QUOTED_STRING_0 should wall street journal articles in the world news section published in the last hour change and their update times is before last year
column3: monitor ( ( @com.wsj.get param:section:Enum(opinions,world_news,us_business,markets,technology,lifestyle) = enum:world_news ) filter param:updated:Date >= start_of unit:h and param:updated:Date <= end_of unit:year - 1 unit:year ) => @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.builtin.say param:message:String = QUOTED_STRING_0

column2: when i dispatch a message on omlet tell me the measurement on my bodytrace scale
check for my new unimportant emails and then reply to them .
column3: monitor ( @com.gmail.inbox param:is_important:Boolean = false ) => @com.gmail.reply on param:email_id:Entity(com.gmail:email_id) = param:email_id:Entity(com.gmail:email_id)

column2: let me know if the update times is not DURATION_0 after last year in wsj opinions articles
column3: monitor ( ( @com.wsj.get param:section:Enum(opinions,world_news,us_business,markets,technology,lifestyle) = enum:opinions ) filter not param:updated:Date == end_of unit:year + DURATION_0 ) => notify
